name: One Night in the Lab
description:
Hello? Can you hear me? Alright listen to me carefully, my boss Mirco advised me to tell you that this security guard job won't be easy at all...

A new horrifying experience

In this horror game you'll have to contain monstrous creatures in a new laboratory. Get ready for a terrifying night on the brink of death!

Key features:
  • A fnaf inspired horror experience
  • Atmospheric ambience
  • Immersive sound design
  • Balanced gameplay mechanics
  • Meticulous character design
Credits:
  • Some audio files  are from the original game Five Nights At Freddys by Scott Cawthon and from Postal by Running with Scissors
Links:

by Acquah (Developer) and HunterDragon127 (3D Artist and Sound designer)
